website_summaries.verdict: An ultra-thin protector that provides near-perfect clarity at 99.99% transparency.
pros: Glass screen protector that's  ultra thin at just 0.33 millimeters thick
9H hardness makes your tablet super durable
Easy to install thanks to included guide
cons: A few reported bubbles after install

customer_reviews.title: LIVID- left Marks on my brand new screen!!!
customer_reviews.text: Negative stars: I followed the directions, using the wet and dry wipes; there were bubbles that formed underneath that would not come out so I removed the tempered glass. As soon as I remove the tempered glass there were what appeared to be water Mark type spots on my screen. They will not come off!!!!!! My brand new iPad is ruined from having this product on there for less than a minute. I tried reusing the wet wipe to remove it, the dry wipe, the cleaning cloth and I even put a blow dryer near it thinking maybe there was some water in there because it appears ring like. The spots are not coming off. I am so angry.
customer_reviews.author: Cvillekp

customer_reviews.title: This is the same exact type of screen protector that I bought from big box store except its 75% cheaper in price !
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I purchased this because I needed another screen protector asap. There was only one left at Best Buy around Christmas time so I bought another brand name for $39.99. When I received this from Amazon, I was expecting to install a [ temporary ] screen protector just long enough until the other one from BB arrived but after i installed and compared the two, the only thing I regretted was not being able to return the one I bought for $39.99 from best Buy ! This is great, looks like the same thing, has same thickness, easy to install and 1/4 of the price ! Great product , thank you .
customer_reviews.author: jimmymacTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The picture is so clear. You can't even tell that there is a screen protector on it. Easy to install. Great price and worth it! Update**** long story short this save my iPad from certain death. It fell off the roof of my car onto a busy road. Came back 15 min later and it was there. If not for the screen protector and the cover it would have bit the dust. Just some damage to one corner of the iPad the other corner it was the glass that took the beating
customer_reviews.author: Prplgrl23

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Truth be told, this is probably a great screen protector, but I would not know due to my own user error as I failed to stick it correctly the first time and after that, it was just a mess and a hassle to the point where I had to, with extraordinary frustration, toss the whole thing out. There really should have been a warning that you get one chance to seal it correctly or you will have air bubbles that you can't remove as multiple attempts to realign and restick do not work. Had I had a cooler head, I may have at least attempted a return.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R Goebel

customer_reviews.title: ... drop & see how it work lol but I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I Have yet had a serious drop & see how it work lol but I like it so far. It's basically like ur second screen (as u see in the pics, it's really hard to see if you're using the screen protector). It covers up all the way to the edges. I use it with the ultra clear thin case which is perfect for protection & super nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nie Bui

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stick well over time
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait before posting a review. The item arrived quickly and was easy to apply w the nice instructions HOWEVER, this item after a few weeks started lifting on the edges, air bubbles arrived and it got worse. Using the iPad became difficult and I had to take the film off (which literally popped off wo hardly any effort). I cleaned iPad tried to restick it but it wasn’t effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IPad 9.7" 2018 Tempered Glass Screen Protection
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of a screen protection from this seller and everything was fine with the first one in 2016, but I think the problem I had with my last purchase was mine because the placement was a fraction of a centimeter off the mark. I was too anxious to have it installed while floor work was going on in my house but having to get it done in the bathroom without enough lightening but be the reason. I love their products and the tempered screen protection is very responsive to touch. I do recommend their tempered glass screen protection and I also like their customer service a lot. I will buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Holy Mocis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is thicker than most and appears to be very durable. I had one on my iPad prior to placing this one that became cracked within a week of using it. You get what you pay for, I guess. Most impressive about this screen protector though is the limited lifetime warranty. If you register your product on their website (you’ll need your amazon order number), you get 2 replacements free of charge if it ever breaks. It does not cover replacement of the iPad or iPhone you’re placing the screen protector on. The registration process was very easy and only took me a couple minutes to complete. Overall, I would definitely recommend this product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to install but not anti-glare
customer_reviews.text: Installation was fairly easy to install, however, even after following the instructions, I did have several large bubbles and after about 5 or so minutes of constantly moving the bubble to the edges, they were gone. Best Buy charges almost the price of this screen protector just to install it so being able to install it on my own is a plus. Hopefully, it will protect my iPad Air 2 screen shouId I drop it. I wish it were anti-glare and I periodically have to clean off fingerprints and smudges. For now I will keep this on my iPad until I find one that is anti-glare and smudge-proof. The price at $8.99 is good.
customer_reviews.author: Godfadda

customer_reviews.title: Better than Zagg
customer_reviews.text: Ok it's not smudge proof by any means. IDK why companies keep advertising glass as smudge proof when that seems scientifically impossible. Anyway.... Better than Zagg! AND cheaper. Stop letting the cell phone stores sell you Zagg for 6x more!!!!!!!!!!! This has a less noticable seam around the edge. Zagg leaves too much space between the edge and the glass.... On every model of phone or tablet they manufacture for. They call that case friendly. Well so is this one and it doesn't have ugly gaps. This brand also follows the EXACT same protocol for registering it for a warranty as Zagg. And they profess to honor it the same way Zagg does.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Simply Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This glass screen protector is exactly as advertised. What I would recommend is this "pro-tip" I found on their application instructions. I turned on the shower and got my small bathroom nice and steamy, then -following the instructions- applied the screen protector. Worked like a charm! No bubbles, no lint, just a quick and almost instantaneous seal. All I had to do was apply some pressure to the edges and I was done. Simply, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie W

customer_reviews.title: This is the only screen protector I will use on my devices
customer_reviews.text: After having excellent success with an amFilm tempered glass screen protector on my iPhone, I decided to try one for my 2017 iPad 9.7". I'm happy to report that the installation went well and the protector is clear and responsive. Installation is made easy by the tabs that can be used to get a precise alignment before you commit to sticking it all down for good. The stiffer tempered glass also helps, as opposed to a softer film which is harder to align and has more problems with bubbles. During installation, dust is your biggest enemy so prepare a clean work area, wash your hands well, and use the dust removal stickies before installing the film.
customer_reviews.author: GDogg

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I've applied a lot of screen protectors for family and friends. Right now, this brand is my favorite. This morning I installed amFilm screen protectors on an iPad Pro 9.7 and iPhone 7 Plus. I love that they come with a wet wipes, dry wipe, and some dust removal stickers. After using those, you peel back the #1 side, and put it on your device (the plastic handles are a BIG help), smooth everything out, then remove the final layer. Quick and easy. I highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: John Skotnik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and protects
customer_reviews.text: Having the tables at each end of the glass pre-attaches to the screen is a tremendous help. I am a fan of amFILM glass protectors for iPhones. I should have put one on my iPad sooner. The only issue I had was trying to register my product at techMatte using the amazon order number on the website and failed. I sent an email to texhMatte a short while ago so have not heard back. I suggest the tip of placing the screen in the device in the bathroom after running hot water for a few minutes should be added to the first step of the instructions. It really works! We have pets and our home is never dust free.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Lau

customer_reviews.title: A Screen Protector That Does not Protect Your Screen
customer_reviews.text: The product initially worked well, however I had recently dropped my iPad and was very surprised to find that the screen protector was not broken, but unfortunately my screen underneath it was in multiple locations (please see attached pics). When notified, TechMatte apologized, but said their warranty only covers the screen protector itself. Very interesting...but not surprising. Unfortunately, I am now stuck with a $150 fee to repair my iPad screen. Bottom line is there is no use using a product that does not work. Why protect your iPad with a screen protector that does not protect? I won’t be making that mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: VV81

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service, I couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.text: Super easy installation and instructions. I’m very happy with the results, but the manufacturer wanted to know if I wasn’t 100% satisfied. I noticed 2 very minor imperfections and brought it to their attention stating that was very happy with the product. They insisted on sending me out another screen protector. I haven’t installed that one yet, but I’m very impressed by their honesty and customer service...
customer_reviews.author: TimM@Wellington

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I needed for my iPad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I wish I would of put one on my iPad Air 2 since the day I got my iPad. I actually dropped my iPad about a yr after I got it..it cracked a little on the screen. After I put this on my iPad Air 2 it looks and works perfectly. It holds the screen. And you can not even notice the crack. It was simple to read the directions. To put it on.i did get a small kitten hair under it( thank god it’s off to the side)she jumped onto the counter on the glass as I was applying it..better than a paw..I would definitely recommend this cover!
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the product itself is great. Very clear, excellent fit, and easy to install. I did, however, manage to break my screen protector. Dropped the Ipad onto a hardwood floor, and it hit just right to put a crack in the screen protector. I noticed the warranty, and sent a message to the seller. I received a response in less than an hour, and after verifying the damage had a brand new replacement in the mailbox just a few days later. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Willey

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector does not include guide strips that enable a flawless application on the screen. Instead, one must place the screen down by hand after the protective film is removed from the sticky bottom side. If the fit is not perfect, then it needs to be picked up and reset. Perhaps that's the reason that it did not stick firmly on several edges. Also an internal bubble formed that could not be dislodged. I left feedback for the vendor with no response. I ended up discarding the screen protector and replacing it. I decided to not try to get a refund since this was a replacement for a previous one that cracked. I figured it wasn't worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L.

customer_reviews.title: Know what you're getting
customer_reviews.text: There is no such thing as bubble free as far as I can tell unless you install this or any other screen with a fairly high level of skill and persistence. As a piece of dust always seems to fly underneath or I don't align the screen as well as I should , I never know how to rate a screen. It's user error for sure and livable for the non-compulsive, but it's still frustrating. Eventually I gave up on this screen as Apple's screen is probably just as good. I don't use screens on my phones and somehow they survive.
customer_reviews.author: Okemos56

customer_reviews.title: Protecting the glass
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my iphone and have dropped it several times, eventually the screen protector cracked but not the glass on the phone. So I purchased one for my ipad. The instructions they give you are clear and easy to understand. I am very happy with the screen protector, it is smooth to the touch and no issues with opening apps. I do not have any glare. I had an issue with the first one I received, so I emailed the company with a picture and the response was immediate. I was happy with their customer support and the 4 day turn around time for the replacement .
customer_reviews.author: Pizella

customer_reviews.title: So good I've purchased it four times!
customer_reviews.text: Should it keep fracturing? Hard call, but I've broken screens before and I do believe shattering the screen guard has saved my screen, so for me $10 insurance everytime I drop the ipad is a great deal. Also, this time around I noticed they have a warranty program, free replacements!! The $40 I already spent was still worth it, but now I'm almost hoping to drop it again! ( No I'm not! ;-) ) I interacted with support today too, quick, friendly, helpful. Giving this product and company two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Don't rush the installation
customer_reviews.text: I've done several of these over the years and they're all about the same. It's critical to make sure you start with a clean screen and they provide you with a moist cleaner then a dry lint free one. No problem. I found it easier to make sure the item was aligned, then gently roll from one end to the other, as opposed to the instructions that say press your fingers down the middle and work out from there. I've owned several of these products and have no doubt it will protect my screen. Have cleaned it a couple of times since installation and it cleaned up easily and very well.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA L. HOFF, CPA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great protection.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first amFilm Glass protector with my last iPhone. I was nervous when putting it on but read the directions and watched the video...both very helpful. I recently installed on my new iPhone and today received one for my iPad. Very easy and I love the protection. My first iPhone fell a couple of times and the screen protector...protected the screen of my phone. Also easy to remove the cracked one to install a replacement screen protector. I didn’t even look at other brands as this one has been soooo good. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, good price
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews had me a little concerned about installation, but it was extremely simple. First I removed my cover so it was more stable. Then used used a microfiber cloth to get the dust and fingerprints off, used the wet wipe and dry wipe they supplied, positioned the screen cover using the touch pad and camera to position it. Pressed it on, applied pressure from center to edge, and used the little cardboard piece to move an air bubble to the edge. That was it. I use it about an hour a day and it works just fine. No glare and I haven't even had to wipe fingerprints off. Wouldn't hesitate to buy another or recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of Some Trades

customer_reviews.title: Not the easiest to install, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased an iPad screen protector from another manufacturer before and it went on within seconds without problems. This one, not so much; the first try was a dismal failure. The company was extremely responsive and very quickly sent a replacement at no charge. This one went on ... okay, took a while to work out the bubbles (TIP: push the bubbles towards the camera and home button holes) but eventually it is on. I'd probably go back to the other company in the future. But GREAT customer service. - although the online warranty registration does not work.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a safety screen for my iPad and this one seemed like the best bet. Turned out I made a good choice. First off, it came in protective packaging so was in perfect shape when I removed it. The installation instructions were clear. I liked the little handles to help get it situated correctly. The only problem I had was there were some air bubbles that I had to left the protector to get rid of. But that turned out to be easy to do. Once on, it is really nice. Can’t tell it’s there and doesn’t smudge the way my original screen did. Recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Will Read

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Protection
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased my iPad 2 years ago, my son put one of these screen protectors on it for me. It was easy to apply and you couldn't tell it was even on there. It did it's job and protected the screen from scratches. But a couple weeks ago I noticed a small crack and decided to replace it. Since I had recently dropped the iPad, it's possible it cracked then. I called my son to find out where he bought the original and reordered another one just like it. It arrived on time and was packaged well by the seller. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money! Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: This product, despite reviews, was easier than any iPad screen protector I’ve had to apply. It went on seemlessly, and I didn’t think a guide would be necessary. I did make sure to clean the screen multiple times before applying as I read dust can be an issue, but I had no specs under the case. Air bubbles pushed out immediately. I have not been able to test durability and I’m hoping I don’t have to! Only con: it’s hard to keep fingerprints off. My son uses it, and the screen is FILTHY after use from his prints. But nothing a cloth can’t clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Rosse

customer_reviews.title: Helpful hints are at the end and the squeeze card doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to put on. A few hints, if you have surgical/doctor gloves wear them. Next make sure you REALLY clean the ipad - even a new one. Also go to teh END of the instructions for the helpful hints.....which should be at the beginning. In addition to the helpful hints being at the end of the steps, the squeeze card is thick paper and did not move the bubble at all. I used an old credit card. Other than that it works fine on my 5th gen ipad, is clear and fit under the case I purchased.....we shall see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Bubble in glass
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased amFilm products many times and have found their products to be of good quality.. However they must have slipped - I got one where there is a bubble in the glass. When there is a bubble in the glass screen... it shows up really bad as it no longer adheres properly. Too bad it is a time sensitive gift, I won't have time to get another one to replace this. Anyways: if you need it done right the first time, the quality of their products is not as consistent a before so just beware.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother if you have a heavy duty iPad case... otherwise it's ok.
customer_reviews.text: This screen is admittedly nice and was relatively easy to install. The wet wipe that comes with the cleaning kit only makes the screen dirtier and covers it in fog so I would suggest skipping that step altogether. The bubbles are hard to get out as the scraper is pretty flimsy. Ultimately, sadly, I had to throw this out almost immediately after installing it because it does NOT work if you have a heavy duty ipad cover. It won't stay on the screen at all. Wasted money...so I would probably only suggest this for people with a regular, nonprotective iPad cover.
customer_reviews.author: sorrowsangel89

customer_reviews.title: Great product now go watching installation video
customer_reviews.text: This protective glass sheild will definetly protect your iPad. But but but you have to be knowledgeable about how to install it. Please go to YouTube and find a good video. I found the best video for installation on Alibaba Express. I wish I would have found it before the installation. I know you have put on many on your cell phones over the years. The iPad is not a cell phone it is much larger and more difficult to install glass unless you know how to do it. Knowledge is power!
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy'sMom

customer_reviews.title: speed
customer_reviews.text: One thing to keep in mind is that if you are going to register your product, you better be quick. When you are ordering there is no way in hell that you can know that you have to register within 30 days of purchase. After I had ordered, it so happened that I dropped my Ipad and broke the screen. It took some time to replace the screen and in fact the control button on the ipad failed to work properly. I bought a new ipad and some days later got around to registering. TOO LATE. So much for the claim, "we've got you covered."
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Great For One Week :(
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my screen protector to this glass one from a plastic one I had purchased years ago that just had been worn down. Sadly, after a week of just having my iPad in a case on a counter with one time it fell from the stand onto the counter top (no actual drop on the floor) it was cracked up and now has bubbles. The previous plastic one held up to numerous drops and moves over the past few years and was hoping this one would be MORE durable.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was truly impressed by the amFilm Glass Protector and especially by the quick response from the company when I had questions. I have had protectors in the past but they were much thinner. This product is thicker and was therefore easier to install. My biggest accolade though is to the customer service and their quick response. Finding a company that truly stands by their products in response to their customers is truly rare today. TechMatte is one of those companies.
customer_reviews.author: jakesnana

customer_reviews.title: Great product! *UPDATE* Adhesive worn off in about a month
customer_reviews.text: *** Unfortunately we have to change our review. We only had this product about a month and the adhesive has worn off. We were very comfortable with our son using our ipad again but unfortunately now we have to find another product.... *** This product is great! My son dropped our iPad and cracked the screen terribly where we couldn't use it because of the broken glass. This cover is exactly what we needed to protect us from injury while continuing to use it. It is thicker than expected which worked out beneficial to us to ensure the broken glass would remain sealed. Excellent manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Connolly

customer_reviews.title: HOLY COW!!  YOU HAVE TO GET THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: I am TERRIBLE at installing these, so my son in law from the UK always does it for me. They had to cancel their trip this summer due to Covid, so I did it myself. Results were HORRIBLE, I couldn't live with it, so I bought a different brand, this brand!!!! Took me about half the time and it is PERFECT!!!!!! I've NEVER put on a screen protector like this! In fact I'm ordering a back up right now!!!! Really, can't say enough good!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried to install this, using their suggestion of doing the install in the bathroom after getting the air hot and moist to prevent dust from getting underneath. Sadly, this did not work and three big dust specs got under the protector. No matter how hard I tried, I couldn’t get them off, so I had to trash the protector. The company was very gracious about the whole incident and refunded my money, so good marks for customer service, but the product itself was not installable.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace the plastic film protector on my iPad Air 2. The plastic film got dirty quickly and it was a pain to clean off the smudges everyday. I have a glass protector on my iPhone 6s which gets few smudges but is easy to clean. I wanted the same for my iPad so I decided to buy this glass protector. The installation was easy. I did have to lift up one corner when a strand of dog fur got trapped, creating a big bubble. But it was fairly easy to fix. I immediately noticed the surface is very smooth and slippery. Also, it stays relatively smudge-free. I highly recommend this glass protector.
customer_reviews.author: GreenArrow

customer_reviews.title: Dropped ipad: screen protector destroyad, iPad was saved!
customer_reviews.text: I had this screen protector for 9 months before a young human dropped my iPad and cracked it, with a big line running from the top to the bottom of the iPad. For several days I thought the iPad screen was cracked. Then my brain started working again and I remembered that I had this glass screen protector on it. After careful examination and much to my delight, I realized that the screen protector was cracked and not the iPad. To make matters better, I contacted the company that sold it and they sent me a new screen protector for free. The world is a wonderful place.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek and silky smooth but..
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen protector because it had two handles from top to bottom to easily apply the protector to the tablet. Very durable and strong tempered glass and protects all the way, however I couldn't give it a 5 star because it appears that the protector gives a static look and it gets a little annoying and I thought I didn't cleaned the screen right until I found out it was the proctor giving the static interface. Would of been better if the protector didn't gave the static look when using the iPad
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Torres

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you read the end of the instructions. ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the end of the instructions. I always struggle with getting these on without dust particles or air pockets. The instructions mentions at the very end to try it in a hot steamy room (such as a bathroom with the shower running). I wish I'd read that first and tried that, I got an air bubble and dust particles even after the heavy cleaning procedure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Foust

customer_reviews.title: This product has saved my iPad
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved my iPad. More than once I have dropped my iPad my wife has the same one without the screen protector and she has cracked her screen do to dropping it. Mine never. This product is pretty easy to install just follow the instructions and keep things super clean. Remember push the bubbles from the center outward. My wife now has one on her iPad as well. As well as my nine year olds iPad
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection for my ipad screen
customer_reviews.text: I have used amFilm screen protector for my iphones and I was so impressed with the quality on the product and again I ordered one for my ipad and I I am equally impressed with it too. applying it was so easy, I got a tip from seller to reduce the chances of dust being stuck between it and screen, apply it in bathroom while running the hot water shower or in any steamy environment which reduce the dust partials in the air and there won't be any chances for dust stuck while applying it. I will be definitely buying screen protector only from them for all my devices. I completely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav

customer_reviews.title: Great price, how you apply it matters.
customer_reviews.text: After a week's time of use, this screen protector has been doing a fantastic job of protecting my 6th generation 9.7" iPad and Apple Pencil. Like all screen protectors you have to be careful not to trap dust underneath, place it appropriately, and ensure there are no air bubbles. Those who are complaining of air bubbles are not placing the screen protector on carefully. This screen protector is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lourdes nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protection
customer_reviews.text: A solid option in the field. It’s not much in the way of glare or smudge reduction, but it’s been on my iPad for a few months and still doesn’t have a scratch on it. Bought an iPhone screen protector of the same type and it did its job marvelously. It broke when dropped on rough pavement screen first, but protected the screen itself from damage, and was easily removable and replaceable without additional breakage.
customer_reviews.author: hawkman60

customer_reviews.title: Fine screen protector - no texture
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find anything specifically written up about it, but purchased it in hopes it would add just a little bit of texture that would make the ipad feel more like "paper" with a pencil. While the pencil works with it just fine as advertised, it's still completely smooth and offers no resistance if you're looking to use it for drawing. I'm still rating 5 stars as it never advertised to add texture. I just hoped...there would be a little for my intended sketchpad use. My search continues for the non pro ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Jicky

customer_reviews.title: Good product...
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough glass screen protector. Crystal clear, perfect alignment for size and the holes. This is my second one, the first was on my old iPad and it kept the screen in great shape. Maybe one of these days I'll learn how to get one on absolutely bubble free. I follow all the instructions but somehow always manage to a get few bubbles in there I just can't chase out. I actually did a worse install on this one than my first one. It's not the product's fault, I just don't do it enough to be any good at it... But it'll do fine, when the display is lit up you don't really see the tiny bubbles anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Ranman

customer_reviews.title: This is better than more expensive brands I have owned and went on easier.
customer_reviews.text: I have had much more expensive items like this and I will tell you, it is incredibly better than the expensive brands. Installation went well. There are very clear instructions and it all worked extremely well. I even bought a couple for my iPhone. I would use these on any device they have covers for. It is sturdy glass. After using for a several weeks now, I can honestly say it rocks. Glad I bought it and truly impressed. I will buy this brand in the future when needed without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bobrick

customer_reviews.title: Don't go without
customer_reviews.text: I had a mishap while I was traveling and cracked my Ipad screen because I forgot to put a protector on it. $195 later with a new screen, I wouldn't make that mistake again. I ordered this protector while my Ipad was being fixed, the minute I got it home, I put the protector on right away. Don't go with out a screen protector. I love how easy it was to put on my Ipad, it crystal clear and I have a piece of mind knowing it is now protected. Don't go without a screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Be careful unwrapping and installing!
customer_reviews.text: The product is well designed for its purpose, and fulfills that purpose beautifully!! The only comment otherwise is to be careful installing! It is somewhat difficult to line up the screen properly so it fits the iPad properly. Also, I sound it impossible to avoid a few small bubbles. The good news is the bubbles are not visible once installed. The best thing is the great protection it provides for the iPad screen.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley W. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Easy, quick installation!
customer_reviews.text: Got this screen protector to fit a new iPad 9.7" after looking at several similar selections' reviews and product descriptions. Very, very happy with this selection! I have installed these kinds of products before and this was by far the easiest to handle and install just by following their instructions. Always moments of high anxiety to get things things straight and without air pockets. Surprisingly good seal right away and surface seems hard and smooth so fingers slide easily across. Did have a couple of air pockets initially (as one usually does) but they were dispersed easily and quickly by following their suggestions. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed as tiny specks on adhesive side.  Unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Received today for wife’s iPad. There are particles that were readily apparent once I removed the Step 1 protective cover and when applying to ipad there are 10 air bubbles with a little pit in the center so the bubbles don’t press out. Requested a replacement through Amazon and now have the added hassle of returning this one. If second one is messed up I guess I will have to try another brand. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Roadie

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector, shipping was significantly delayed for no apparent reason!
customer_reviews.text: We have used these screen protectors many times. Great fit and finish. They go on easily with just a little time and patience. Be sure to follow the directions to get all of the dust off of the screen before you apply to prevent dust bubbles just as warned. Shipping was delayed by 6 days for no apparent reason. Had them shipped to my inlaws house due to us being there after Christmas for a hunting trip. They did not arrive until after we had left (6 days late), so my mother in law had to reship them to us for an extra cost. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: James Haydel

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a 5 because of the great customer service. They stand behind their product and make sure you are satisfied. They also response quickly. I'm happy with the screen saver. A few tips when applying is to push the bubbles toward the power button hole and the tiny hole at the top. Do not try to push the bubbles to the sides because the fit is very snug and tight so the bubbles do not go out. Practice placing the screen saver using the handles before permanently placing it. Also be careful not to press down too hard because the screen will crack.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: After having trouble with another brand of screen protector I was in need of a new and tempered glass protector. Took a chance on amFilm and I am glad I did, will purchase this brand again and recommend it as well! No, issues installing, the bubbles smoothed out and you can’t even tell there is a protector on your tablet! This protector works well with the Apple iPad 6th generation as well as the Appple pen or the not so expensive brand the ADRAWPEN.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Jackson-Boone

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with LIFETIME WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: First of All, I contacted the Seller about an ISSUE, (MY ISSUE) He responded back in less within 1 Hour!! I put on the Protector. It fits Great. I did not give a 4 for Smudge-proof. Nothing is Smudge Proof with Children. The other Features are all gooD. If you register your Product, there is a Lifetime Warranty through The Manufacturer. That Part I like. I placed this on a NEW IPAD Newest Model, 6th Generation. I would Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I out this on my daughter's new Ipad (6th gen) and she left the ipad in the floor. The light cover from the fan fell off and hit dead in the middle of the screen of her ipad, shattered the light cover, left nothing but a tiny scratch on the tempered glass. I am very impressed. I will definitely buy more of these if I have to. But it looks like these will survive quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Ease of applying
customer_reviews.text: I only marked a 3(except installing)because I don't like writing glorifying reviews right of the bat. But, so far I can testify to the ease of application to the iPad and the beautiful, like knew look it has given my 2 year old iPad. Felt like a sturdy protector while I was applying. Been very smooth so far and reaction time is up to par. Will review again and update later after some use.
customer_reviews.author: waljack

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing on my iPad!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I ordered 2 of these screen protectors. The first one was applied and went on without a hitch. The second one, not so much. There was a bubble that I simply could not get out and a tiny speck of something else that appeared to have some color to it. I couldn't get that to go away either. I emailed customer support and they immediately sent me a replacement. Now that's what I call outstanding customer service!! The new screen protector was applied and no bubble or speck. Thank you so much for your kind understanding.
customer_reviews.author: mymadison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this screen protector. It goes on a school iPad carried by a 12 year old. We had the same one last year and it worked so well be bought another this year. It is easy to install, a very independent kid did it himself, no bubbles! His ipad is in a school provided case that covers everything but the screen. The protector fits under the case well and does not pull up at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: C. Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: IT PROTECTS AS THEY ADVERTISED !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this screen protector for my iPad. I was so pleased with the ease of getting it on the first time. In the past on my phone, I’ve had to pay someone to put it on. Great product, it did exactly what it was suppose to. I dropped my iPad and three little cracks happened. I ordered a new protector and inquired to how to remove and replace it. It’s just as easy to get off, even with the small cracks. My inquiry was responded to right away and they informed me they have a lifetime warranty and so if I drop again I have the free one available. Great product, service and very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great company and product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The protector itself is nice. I have put many screen protectors on tablets and phones alike. This one seemed to have a lack of adhesive in a few spots in the middle. I’ve worked the bubbles out, but there are still two dime sized spots that will not stay adhered. In addition, one of the bottom corners has the same issue. Edit: Company stood by product and sent me a replacement. Second time around went seamless. Company does good business and stands by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Ayntscurd

customer_reviews.title: Great Protecter
customer_reviews.text: This protector went on my iPad very nicely. I may have had one bubble on the very edge that went below my case. It went on smoothly and didn't take to long to put on. It is thin enough to fit under my case that comes up around the home button. It acts just like an iPad screen, so there is some glare. It does smudge from greasy fingers, but less than the real screen. I have had no problems with scratching. It has worked very nicely for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Broke my real screen!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what happened, but shortly after I installed this, I noticed the glass on my iPad had actually cracked!! It was not cracked before I put this on, and it is a new iPad! I wasn’t rough with it, I used the cheap cardboard piece to get the air bubbles out, etc. I have no idea how much a new IPad screen costs, but now I’m about to be out a decent amour of money because of this screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be installed without bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Followed every recommended step they listed, steamy bathroom, cleaned the device thoroughly, applied it very slowly and still got several very ugly bubbles. Manufacturer sent me replacement screen protector, was even more careful with it and STILL got bubbles. Just not a good screen protector, I have ones on other devices that I never had this kind of issue with. It's made worse the fact on this one you are getting one screen protector and they will give you only one replacement if there's an issue with the first one. Won't be buying any protectors from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Shintsu

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice and works great
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and easier to install than I thought, the guide stickers dont work cause they are not sticky enough to hold on to it cause of how heavy it is compared to a phone screen protector, I would recommend more guide stickers, other than that it only came with one screen protector in it unlike others out there, would recommend it cause that second one puts people's minds at ease, but other than that, it fit, and works, and came on time so 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions or you’ll get air bubbles.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good screen protector, but I ended up with so many bubbles. It’s my fault though, I didn’t use the wet or dry wipes because the screen looked “clean” enough, but itty bitty bits of dust were on the screen, which caused a lot of air pockets. I had to order a new one... ugh. That’s what you get for rushing through things and not following directions. 😣 Wish me luck on putting on the new one. If you follow the instructions exactly it will probably work much better!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - very impressed - bubble disappeared
customer_reviews.text: It installed easily, feels nice, screen is very responsive, etc. My kids have dropped it several times and no damage to either the protector or my screen. When I needed a 2nd one for another device, my 7 year old wanted to help put it on, so I ended up with 2 small bubbles that I just couldn't press out. I figured we'd just live with it, but I noticed yesterday that both the bubbles are gone now (about 5 days later). Will definitely stick with this brand next time I need a screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck! Only con I had was after install I found a piece of lint in the top corner underneath the protector. I peeled it up enough and used one of the stickers supplied to remove the lint but the protector wouldn’t stay stuck to the screen in that spot. Not a big deal since I have a case that goes around the iPad and covers where it’s slightly raised.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Air bubbles
customer_reviews.text: The protector fit, but I had a heck of a time removing air bubbles. I’ve put these on before, and carefully cleaned my screen and installed in a humid bathroom. Never could get that last air bubble out, but it was small. Now, several months later, a really big bubble had developed at the lowere edge of my device, and I can’t get rid of it. Maybe the protector isn’t completely flat? Has an issue with its adhesive?
customer_reviews.author: Ziacat

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Just a few bubbles but I expect them to vanish with time. As with most protectors there is still a glare. Once I removed my old screen this went on easily once I got it aligned.
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Shafer

customer_reviews.title: amFilm iPad 9.7 Screen protector - Tempered Glass
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old film type screen protector on my iPad that had yellowed and had what looked like smoke burns on the sides. I followed the directions provided with the tempered glass screen protector and it was very easy to place it on the iPad. Make sure to line up the top and bottom openings and smooth it from the middle out. A steady hand and patience helps. I recommend this product and would buy it again. My iPad looks like new again.
customer_reviews.author: Jannabelle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Put this on a brand new IPad and cleaned it like the directions said even though it was a brand new IPad with no dust or fingerprints on it just to be safe, and everything stuck fine. I come back an hour later to see it had unstuck in one corner, but I wasn’t too bothered because it didn’t affect the screen . Woke up this morning to find it has unstuck in every corner and cannot be pressed back down. I’m disappointed it didn’t last 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of three

customer_reviews.title: Won't adhere to the screen until it's has shifted out of place
customer_reviews.text: Bubbles, bubbles and more bubbles. Although the video showing how to install this product makes it look easy, it is harder than it looks. I've tried to install this product three times and all of them didn't adhere to the screen properly. Bubbles showed up at the bottom and top of the screen. Then bubbles appeared on both sides. My attention attempts to remove the bubbles just caused the screen to shift, covering the home button and camera. Only then did it adhere to the screen. Since the iPad was now unusable, I had to remove the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this screen protector for our brand new ipad. The description stated zero bubbles... that was not true! The description also stated scratch resistant... that is not true! More than that, this screen “protector” did not protect my iPad from ANYTHING! My sons 2DS was dropped accidentally from about 3 inches away from my IPAD and with the screen protector in place, it shattered my screen.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Silva

customer_reviews.title: I only buy amFilm because
customer_reviews.text: I legitimately buy only amFilm. I have used many different types of screen protectors. These are easy to install. The holes are cut just about perfect. They don't crack as easily as some. They also do a great job of not scratching. One thing I do notice is how much my finger prints stick to the film. They do a great job of going on clear and easy to get that speck of dust that always seems to attach to the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: James Mueller

customer_reviews.title: So far it is durable.
customer_reviews.text: Product is thinner than the tempered glass screen cover I have on my phone, but it has proved durable so far. -1 star because when I put it on I had massive air bubble problems that took me about an hour to smooth out with constant pressure and rubbing toward the edges of the screen... despite the fact that the iPad was brand new and screen was spotless. I swear, I pressed so hard to push the air bubbles out I thought the pressure alone was gonna crack the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Happy in Bama...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product and it was a breeze to install. No bubbles and No dirt under the glass. Glass is durable and easy to clean. I bought another, more expensive brand 1st and it was hotter story to install. I had lots of bubbles and dirt trapped under the glass... so I sent it back for a refund and purchased the amFilm brand. So glad I did. Would recommend this bran highly.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service is top notch!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these screen protectors. The first one my son messed up on applying it, and the second went on perfectly! There are written instructions and a video tutorial, which he didn't watch, which is why the first one didn't work out. I emailed the company with our "user error" and they immediately responded in less than 24 hours sent us another screen protector a few days later. Seriously great customer service!!! Easiest customer service experience I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: ACAZ

customer_reviews.title: Stars coming off after 2 week, not smudge proof and glare is still a problem
customer_reviews.text: Item pictured is not what I ordered, have no idea how they can switch that device for the actual AMFLIM GLASS SCREEN PROTECTOR for my iPad. I’m not sure my review will go to the correct product. This review is for the AMFLIM GLASS SCREEN PROTECTO- I’ve glass screen protectors on man devices over the years. After 2 weeks a large bubble appeared on one corner. I’ve never had this happen with previous glass protectors. Also smudge prints are terrible with the glare it stands out. I cannot recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Screen Protector Application Yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was happy with the Switch screen protector application. This was even easier. There were no bubbles; It was completely adhered in about 15 seconds, all on its own. Awesome product. I would definitely take the advice of the manufacturer and do this in a steamed room where the dust is minimal. I did get a couple loose dust particles stick to the adhesive side, as this isn't a wet application, just an adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Elliott

customer_reviews.title: You can re-adhere it and remove bubbles without concern!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with two, as with the iPhone sized version. I seriously wish all covers were as wonderful and easy to work with as this. I don’t understand people that say they cannot get the bubbles out, just take your time! They also offer an easy way to reach them in case you miss the mark... however when I realized it was slightly askew, I was able to take it off (risky!) and re-adhere it again with no bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: JSCK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and installed easy
customer_reviews.text: This glassywent on so easy that I'm waiting for something to go wrong. It's the perfect size and between the tabs on attached to the plastic cover and the guide tape it could not be easier. I've always been pretty good at applying these to phones ant small tablets but this was a little bigger and I was expecting some sort of problem but nope it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Dieseldean

customer_reviews.title: That it’s a great screen protector and easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: The protection glass was awesome it did all it was supposed to do except It was my first time and I ended up with a dime size bubble and hard as I may I couldn’t get it out so I watched the video on utube and I tried to remove it but I made it worse, the company was very gracious and sent me another one which is still in the box and this time my computer tech son can put it on for me!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen ducharme

customer_reviews.title: Screen protector with a warranty
customer_reviews.text: The product came very well packaged with easy to understand instructions on how to "install" The cover had a few bubbles on the first try but i smoothed them out with a credit card. the screen allows for easy use of my ipad and does not interfere with the touch screen. I did develop a small crack fairly quickly after I ordered it (due to it banging against the edge of a table) and I issued a claim with the warranty department - I am waiting for a response from them but think that it's great that a company stands behind their products and offers a warranty for these items.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Unique install aids
customer_reviews.text: This is a superior product. Though I really cannot compare the glass in this protector to the glass in other, I can say that overall, including installation, this is a better product than others I have used in the past. First there are excellent instructions on their website. Second the double tabs on the protector make it so much easier to locate properly on the iPad and thus help to ensure a good install. Third the price is lower than most other glass protectors. Clearly this was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Steven

customer_reviews.title: Super good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new ipad! It was delivery super fast, it took only minutes to open and install! Its top quality and is super durable! I've had it on there for months and I dont have any scratches on it. I've taken it to work, let my little cousins play on it, and have taken it on vacation as well. Super awesome product especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ereripancake

customer_reviews.title: It is set up to install easily and minimize the chance of air bubbles.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first one of these that is set up to install easily and minimize the chance of air bubbles. The kit is really well thought out right down to small sticky tabs that pick up any stray lint or hair that floats onto the screen after it is cleaned. The screen itself works as well as any other high end protective film. It has no discernible distortion even off axis, adds no color or "darkness" and sticks well. Four stars because you lose a tiny bit of sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Graf

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This protector fits my iPad Pro 9.7” perfectly. I wanted something sturdy to protect the screen against cracks and the quality of this protector is great. So is their customer service. I emailed them with questions about the protector and they responded INSTANTLY. I highly recommend this screen protector AND this company.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Bubble
customer_reviews.text: I've put these on before so I was cautious to ensure the glass on the iPad was utterly clean. The screen protector went on perfectly and I was able to squeeze out the bubbles. It looked great! Couldn't tell it was even on there. That was last night. This afternoon there is a large bubble extending from the lower right corner up the right side to a little past the middle of the screen, and about 1.5 inches wide. I try squeezing it out but it pops right back. I've seen other reviews with similar comments. Maybe it's an adhesive issue?
customer_reviews.author: D. P. Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: This was a bad buy, my son (3) has an iPad and I put this protector on it along with a bumper case. He dropped it one time and not even hard and the whole screen cracked, not screen protector but the actual screen cracked and kept cracking with every little push to it. I’m so upset. How is it protecting the screen and the screen cracked.
customer_reviews.author: L.G

customer_reviews.title: Always add to your devices!
customer_reviews.text: the amFilm Glass Screen Protectors have protected many devices for my family and my coworkers. We always put these on our iPhones. My husband thought he had cracked his iPhone screen and then we remembered we had installed the amFilm. So....no question that we would purchase for his new iPad. I was nervous about installing but it was super easy. The installation directions suggested installing in a steamy bathroom...I would highly recommend this method.
customer_reviews.author: Callie O'Mallie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, unnoticeable over my Ipad screen.
customer_reviews.text: Was well packaged to protect the protector from damage. I installed per instructions and had no issues with air bubbles. If you just lay it on top of your screen, and wait a few seconds, you will see it adhere itself to the screen. Only then did I run my finger over it as instructed to remove any possible air bubbles. The instructions offer a link to further tips for install, but I did not use them. It has been a couple of weeks since install and the protector is virtually invisible. A $10.00 part to protect a $250.00 Ipad is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DLW

customer_reviews.title: Once installed they work really well... just be careful with handling.
customer_reviews.text: I've used quite a few different brands of glass screen protectors over the years. These had great reviews, so I figured I would try them after my last one cracked. The first one I pulled out of the box shattered in my hands as I was taking it out. I know they are supposed to be thin, but I was pretty surprised. I've never had that happen before. Maybe they are just super thin. I ordered another one and was more careful as I removed it and it installed fine and look / works wonderfully. Just be careful with that unpackaging!
customer_reviews.author: Vince Arter Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Screen Productor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, we just had trouble getting it to work with one of those iPad cases that have a frame type, compression frame. These type of cases are very prevalent. The problem is that our Granddaughter wanted one with a kitten on it. My wife and I got cases that use a leather slide/pocket case. They work great with this type of this screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: KAPS77

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lightweight screen cover
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be doing the job. It replaced a heavy plastic cover that was smudged and nicked and coming apart at the sides. This product was easy to apply and is very smooth and silky. I was left with 2 little semi-circle tags on the final sheet that caused me to question that I had the correct film on my iPad. Finally determined that I did, and then had to cut off the tags.
customer_reviews.author: R  or B Cullerton

customer_reviews.title: Price is right too!
customer_reviews.text: The protector has only been on for a week or so. But at this point I am crazy about it. Installing it was a breeze. No air bubbles at all. It's super clear and finger prints are minimal and just wipe right off. I feel like I am using a new machine because it's so nice looking now. Love it and I would purchase this product again. It's been a year. I dropped my iPad. Protector broke, iPad DID NOT!! It did a fabulous job, best 10 bucks I've ever spent. Ordered my replacement and it was just as easy to install as the first time, thanks again for a super product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Screen Protection
customer_reviews.text: I only buy this brand of screen protector. They are inexpensive, but clear, easy to apply, and last well. I prefer them to the Zagg because I can't tell the difference in performance (actually these seem more durable) and it is quicker, easier, and cheaper just to order a new one (especially if you have Amazon prime) than to go through the hassle with Zagg. Plus, you have to buy a lot of these to equal the price of one Zagg!
customer_reviews.author: Kirkland Mom

product_meta.title: amFilm Glass Screen Protector for iPad 9.7 6th Gen, 5th Gen, iPad Pro 9.7, iPad Air, Air 2, Tempered Glass, Apple Pencil Compatible
feature_bullets: Specifically designed to be a perfectly fit glass screen protector for the Apple iPad Air, iPad Air 2, New iPad 9.7, and iPad Pro 9.7 inch (Education Edition), iPad 2018, iPad 5th Generation, and 6th Generation, and iPad 2017 [[[NOT COMPATIBLE WITH THE 2019 IPAD AIR 10.5"]]]. Fully compatible with the Apple Pencil and the Multi-Touch subsystem. (Model numbers: A1674 A1675 A1673 A1954 A1823 A1567 A1467 A1476 A1457 A1474 A1566 A1822 A1893)
Perfect Clarity: 99.99% Transparency. Our protectors allow an optimal, natural view of your phone's display, even though we construct it to be you're phone's armor.
Ultra Thin 0.33 millimeters thick with multiple layers of protection: Premium Tempered Glass Shield, Silicone Adhesive, Anti-Shatter Film and Oleophobic Coating
Featured 9H hardness, our screen protector is Highly Responsive, Durable and Scratch Resistant, Easy to Install, Zero-Bubble Guaranteed and Anti Fingerprint.
Includes: iPad Air Glass Screen Protector, Wet/Dry Wipes, Dust Removal Stickers and Installation & Use Guide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars8,155 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
